article.name: How do I uninstall mackerel-agent?
article.title: How do I uninstall mackerel-agent?
article.body:
You can uninstall mackerel-agent by following the uninstall instructions for your OS.

For Linux users

You can uninstall mackerel-agent using the uninstall command in the package manager.

If you want to uninstall everything including plugins, please execute the following command.

Amazon Linux / Amazon Linux2 / CentOS / Red Hat

sudo yum remove mackerel-agent mackerel-agent-plugins mackerel-check-plugins mkr

Ubuntu / Debian

sudo apt-get remove mackerel-agent mackerel-agent-plugins mackerel-check-plugins mkr

If you are using Windows

Uninstall mackerel-agent from Start > Control Panel > Programs > Programs and Features.
